%spark
import model.person.v2._
import org.insightedge.spark.implicits.all._
import org.insightedge.spark.context.InsightEdgeConfig

//Change space name here if not working with default
val ieConfig = new InsightEdgeConfig("wanSpaceDE",lookupGroups = None, lookupLocators = Some("a7939aaca176411ea988302c7a346453-215909573.us-east-2.elb.amazonaws.com:4174"))

sc.initializeInsightEdgeContext(ieConfig)
